critique: The document aims to evoke joy and hope by addressing systemic barriers and promoting equity for AA and NHPI communities. It also acknowledges past injustices and elicits sadness and perhaps some fear due to the violence and discrimination faced by these communities. There's an element of surprise in recognizing the disparities and a desire to combat disgust towards racism and xenophobia. The initial scores reflect these emotions, but the revised scores adjust the intensity based on a more nuanced reading of the text.
